Uses of Class
com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation.Compilers.Builder

  • Packages that use Compilers.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation
    Classes related to the compilation of Flows into FlowExecutions.

    • Uses of Compilers.Builder in com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation

      Methods in com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation that return Compilers.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Compilers.Builder<FlowCompiler> Compilers.builder()
      Obtain a fluent "builder" for specifying the properties of a FlowCompiler.
      Compilers.Builder<C> Compilers.Builder.loggingTo(FlowLogger logger)
      Specifies that FlowExecutions compiled by the constructed compiler will log messages to the provided FlowLogger.
      Compilers.Builder<C> Compilers.Builder.loggingToConsole()
      Specifies that FlowExecutions compiled by the constructed compiler will log messages to the console.
      Compilers.Builder<C> Compilers.Builder.mutationChecking()
      Specifies that FlowExecutions compiled by the constructed compiler will try to enforce the rule that values stored in the Scratchpad cannot be mutated.
      Compilers.Builder<FlowCompiler> Compilers.Builder.recordingTo(FlowHistoryRepository<?> repository)
      Specifies that FlowExecutions compiled by the constructed compiler will record a trace of their execution history to the provided FlowHistoryRepository.
      Compilers.Builder<TracedFlowCompiler> Compilers.Builder.tracingWith(TraceEventListener eventListener)
      Specifies the FlowExecutions compiled by the constructed TracedFlowCompiler will emit trace messages to the provided TraceEventListener.
